attributes.description: We see so many vehicles but every now and again you come across a car that makes one step back and take notice. Tons of 2018 model and even newer vehicles that have nothing on this car in terms of overall condition and presentation. The previous owner is a dear friend of ours. The car was his pride and joy. Always Garage Parked. No food or animals have ever been allowed in the vehicle. LOOKS, FEELS AND DRIVES LIKE A BRAND NEW CAR. 20 out of 10, IMPOSSIBLE TO FAULT, full service history, every single service completed up to date with LAND ROVER and LAND ROVER SPECIALISTS Rear Entertainment package with dual LCD screens and 4X headsets This is the top of the range HSE spec which comes fully loaded with every extra and luxury you can possibly imagine including LAND ROVER TOUCH SCREEN INFOTAINMENT WITH VOICE COMMAND SATELLITE NAVIGATION and Blue Tooth Connectivity, Double Sun Roof, REVERSE CAMERA, Park Distance Control Front and Rear, Electric Memory Seats with Lumbar Support, Park Distance Control, FACTORY FITTED REMOVABLE TOW, Alpine surround sound etc. Perfectly Looked after by Land Rover Fanatic. Known to be more reliable than the diesels in the long term AN ABSOLUTE DREAM TO TOW WITH. YOU CANNOT FIND A CLEANER DISCOVERY WITH SUCH LOW MILEAGE AND COMPREHENSIVE SERVICE HISTORY IN THIS PRICE RANGE ANYWHERE IN SA Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security DEKRA TESTED FOR INCREASED QUALITY ASSURANCE
attributes.title: 2010 Land Rover Discovery 4 5.0 V8 HSE

attributes.description: THE FORD FUSION IS WITHOUT A SHADOW OF A DOUBT THE BEST LUXURY SALOON MONEY CAN BUY LOOK, FEELS, DRIVES AND EVEN SMELLS LIKE A BRAND NEW VEHICLE One owner since new, Previous owner started working from home when covid hit and has used the car very sparingly since, ALWAYS GARAGE PARKED, NO FOOD OR ANIMALS HAVE EVER BEEN ALLOWED IN THE VEHICLE ABSOLUTELY SPOTLESS CONDITION. Full service history, every single service completed on schedule and up to date ANUALLY with FORD, including service recently completed at FORD. Fully loaded with every extra and luxury you can possibly imagine including Multifunctional leather steering wheel. NEW GEN FORD LINK TOUCH SCREEN INFOTAINEMENT powered by Microsoft which includes Full Smart Phone integration with APP PLAY AND REVERSE CAMERA, ACTIVE CRUSIE CONTROL, Park distance control front and rear, Electric folding mirrors with auto dim, electric memory seats with heating function, Individual Split suedeLeather upholstery, Auto armor safety smash and grab tinted windows etc. etc. 1.5 Turbo charged engine offers brilliant power, CLASS LEADING FUEL ECONOMY If you are looking for value in a luxury saloon with demo mileage and as new condition then this is the one you have been waiting for Must be seen to and driven to be appreciated. FULL 7 PAGE DEKRA CONDITION REPORT NOW AVAILABLE FOR A FULLY TRANSPARENT AND SUPERIOR BUYING EXPER Top of the range CARTRACK tracking unit pre fitted for your safety and security

attributes.description:
Welcome to the King of Cars Group

King of Cars has more than 15 years of experience in the motor industry and offers over 200 professionally evaluated vehicles. We offer advice & assistance to clients, from financial solutions to the smart way to buy / sell your vehicle. 

We also offer a ‘Breaking Borders’ approach. We can start the application process online or telephonically, complete the entire sale this way and even deliver the vehicle to your doorstep anywhere in South Africa. We’ll help you make the car of your dreams a reality.  

Contact or visit our showroom today!

Please Note: Administration, delivery and license and registration fees are not included.
